! Color code (RGB)  
! Color code (RGB) 
!
! EDIT WITH CAUTION (At least three lines are required for each block starting with >)
! At least one blank line must be inserted between two blocks
! ONLY USE DIGITS BETWEEN 0 AND 1 TO DEFINE THE RGB COLOURS
!
!                       ****************
!                       *    NOTES     *
!                       ****************
!
! LEGEND:
!		- C		Colorblind friendly
! 		- D		Divergent
!		- P		Black and white printing friendly
!		- L		Linear between two colors
!
!
! Some of these color palettes are largely inspired from www.ColorBrewer.org 
! by Cynthia A. Brewer, Geography, Pennsylvania State University
!
